faqs.ques: What are the prerequisites or requirements to join a cohort?
faqs.ans: Being enthusiastic and passionate to learn. You are not required to have programming or design experience to apply, however applicants with prior experience have a higher change of being accepted.

faqs.ques: Can students from any major apply?
faqs.ans: Yes. We are open to accept applicant from all majors

faqs.ques: What kinds of projects cohort members work on?
faqs.ans: Cohort member work on a real client project with the guidance of designated leads. These project range from website and mobile apps, to design and brand development projects.

faqs.ques: What is the expected time commitment?
faqs.ans: Weekly time commitment is highly influence on the project or stage that you are working on. Usually cohort member could spend anywhere between 5-10+ hours per week.

faqs.ques: How is a week of work usually like?
faqs.ans: Member are expected to attend a minimum of one weekly meeting with their teams. These team meetings usually last 2 hours. Then they will be assigned work to do outside of their zmeeting times.

faqs.ques: What is the cost of membership?
faqs.ans: $15 per quarter. Membership dues help us to pay for our technological services, host events and production of marketing materials.
Cohort members work on a project during two continuous quarters. Board members are expected to hold their position for the whole school year.

faqs.ques: Are there opportunities for advancement within the club?
faqs.ans: Yes. High performer members are often consider for leadership position after the completion of their cohort project.

As part of #include you will gain real-world experience, expand your skills, network with professionals, enhance your portfolio, and develop leadership abilities. All of which contribute to your professional growth and open doors to exciting career opportunities.

phases.title: Discovery Phase
phases.description: In the initial consultation, we'll schedule a meeting to discuss your project requirements, goals, and vision. Our team will conduct thorough research and analysis to gain a deep understanding of your industry, target audience, and competitors.

phases.title: Planning Phase
phases.description: Based on the information gathered, we'll brainstorm and develop creative concepts for your project. We'll then present you with a detailed proposal outlining our approach, and timelines.

phases.title: Design Phase
phases.description: This is where the magic happens. Our designers will create wireframes and interactive prototypes to visualize the structure and functionality of your project.

phases.title: Development Phase
phases.description: Our skilled developers will bring the designs to life by coding the user interfaces and implementing responsive layouts. If needed, we'll integrate complex functionalities and databases to ensure a seamless user experience.

phases.title: Deployment and Launch
phases.description: This is the exciting phase where your project is ready to be unveiled to the world.

phases.title: Post Launch Support
phases.description: If requested, we'll provide training to your team on managing and updating the project.
